channel.title: Windows 10 on Derek Reinhardt
channel.description: Recent content in Windows 10 on Derek Reinhardt

item.title: Windows 10 and the Future
item.description: Windows 10 has been out for a little over 4 months now. I’ve had it installed on a vitual machine since then. I like to see what’s coming, and get a grasp on it. In the past, with Windows 7, 8, and the 8.1, and the 10 (up to now) betas that is all I’ve every done. Then my desktop started giving me problems. Let me lay a little bit of ground work.
